tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Mac is prosecuting a SEAL jumpmaster charged with causing the death of one of his men during a parachute insertion exercise.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Real Deal Seal
programme.desc: Medal of Honor Navy SEAL Lt. Curtis Rivers is court-martialed for punching a Congressional candidate who claims to be a Navy SEAL.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Overdue And Presumed Lost
programme.desc: A salvage company tries to claim rights to the wreckage of the USS Dolphin, a WW2 submarine that was lost the day before the attack on Pearl Harbor in 1941.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: Louis Cellucci is having a rough time aboard the flight deck of the USS Benjamin Harrison. Moments after he walks away from another failed attempt at fixing an F-14, shouts of Man Overboard! are heard across the deck.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Walk on Wings
programme.desc: Congresswoman Latham and a colleague watch four marine jumpers jump into the ocean from an M22 Osprey. With two marines left to jump, the plane is struck by a swell in the ocean. Harm and Mac are instructed to investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Guilt
programme.desc: When Captain Huddleston hears that the marine corporal has been charged with rape, he sends Lt. Colonel Sarah Mac MacKenzie to handle the case in a hot zone of Anti-American activity.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kenny and the Jet
programme.desc: Paige's maternal side goes into high gear when Team Scorpion must save an unconscious, a hypothermic boy stuck in the wheel well of their airborne airplane.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Lie in the Sand
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Northeast Africa where they must carefully navigate a minefield in order to save the lives of local villagers.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Pilot
programme.desc: When a crisis at LAX leaves dozens of airplanes unable to land, the government enlists a team of misfit geniuses to save the day.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Single Point of Failure
programme.desc: The Governor calls on Team Scorpion when his daughter is mysteriously "bio-hacked" with a deadly virus and has only 24 hours to live.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Cyclone
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is determined to prove their worth when a bomber threatens to take out the internet infrastructure of the entire Southwest.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Shorthanded
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Las Vegas for a simple casino job, but a robbery leads to Walter's arrest and the rest of the team is left to clear his name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Stung
programme.desc: Using a local car dealership, 15 Division runs a sting operation to crack down on suspects with outstanding warrants. One of the criminals they capture tries to bargain for a lighter sentence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: In Plain View
programme.desc: When a police informant is found murdered, 15 Division sets its sights on finding a weak link in the notoriously brutal East Jameson gang. Andy has to work closely with Detective Jo Rosati, a woman who seems far too interested in Andy’s fiancé, Luke.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: When a woman gets brutally attacked in the same manner as deceased rookie cop Zoe Martinelli. Det. Luke Callaghan is convinced that it’s the same suspect.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Monster
programme.desc: After a seemingly drunken man collapses in the barn, 15 Division is put under quarantine. Andy and Swarek work together to find the accomplice of a dyed blue bank robber.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Dov and Gail work together under Swarek’s expert tutelage in a stake-out operation to stop an Asian gang from killing a snitch.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: 15 Division’s hunt for an armed robber leads them to the scene of a horrible car accident. While Andy deals with a woman pinned in her car, the other officers must track and apprehend the fugitive.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team take on their largest investigation to date. They have been invited to investigate a large estate where it seems just about every building has a ghostly tale.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: As the team split up the fear become palpable. Without the safety of numbers the team are feeling they are being stalked and Glen comes face to face with some unexplained physical phenomena.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hodroyd Hall
programme.desc: Karl & Stu investigate the attic of Hodroyd Hall, and soon become witness to the many strange occurances. What or who is trying to make contact?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Leeds Town Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures alone into the underneath Leeds Town Hall into the dark prison cells that is said to be haunted by a plethora of unhappy spirits, one doesn’t seem happy that Karl is there.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the ground floor back rooms of this landmark castle alone, but soon realises that something is lurking in the shadows.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P2
programme.desc: The upper floors of Margam Castle are said to be haunted by many different spirits, Stuart goes it alone to try and find them.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 1st Edition Apparition
programme.desc: TAPS is revisiting Edith Wharton's home, The Mount, in Lenox, Massachusetts. It's believed Edith andher husband could be behind increased activity since the team's last investigation in 2008.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hindenburg Crash Site
programme.desc: In the exciting season finale, TAPS travels to the site where Hindenburg, one of history's most infamous disasters, took place.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Stage Fright
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the team heads to Rapids Theater in Niagara Falls, New York where a lonely actress hanged herself backstage. The staff believes her spirit has never left and is haunting the theater.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Bloodiest 47 Acres
programme.desc: TAPS is called out to Jefferson City, Missouri, to investigate the notorious Missouri State Penitentiary. A prison that was once named one of the most violent prisons in America.Riots, stabbings and executions left thousands dead over the years.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Shamrock Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,the TAPS team has been asked to go to Paddy Reilly's Bar in Manhattan, New York to help explain some after hours activity.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Music of a Distant Drum
programme.desc: Tyr crash lands the Eureka Maru on a Nietzschean planet and develops amnesia. He must remember what he is doing before the Nietzscheans discover him and his crate of stolen goods.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Harper 2.0
programme.desc: Harper receives the gift of knowledge from a dying Perseid, only to discover that the Perseid was being sought by a bounty hunter who has now turned his attention to Harper.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Forced Perspective
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Sum of Its Parts
programme.desc: Andromeda is boarded by a drone from the Consensus of Parts, a mythical mechanical society. While friendly at first, the drone tries to force the ship to join the Consensus.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.sub-title: Fear and Loathing in the Milky Way
programme.desc: Gerentex is back, and demands Trance and Harper help him with his new scheme: finding Tarn-Vedra.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Devil Take the Hindmost
programme.desc: Dylan and Rev Bem help a peaceful society to stand up to their would-be slavers. They have to be careful because if Dylan teaches them to kill, their kids will be born knowing it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.180
programme.desc: A 66-year-old analyst for the U.S. Department of Defense claims he\t\t\t\r\nwas intimate with a 27-year-old sports bar worker and that she owes\t\t\t\r\nhim money. She denies his claims.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.166
programme.desc: Woman faces lawsuit for unpaid bail from speeding with suspended license. Man sues ex for car loan balance; she countersues for job loss.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.19
programme.desc: Man alleges ex-girlfriend ordered escort attack in bar; she denies and countersues for dirt bike balance, car vandalism, and harassment/Trashed hotel room after 18th birthday sparks damages lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.138
programme.desc: Pit bull terrier attacks family in park; owner accused of intoxication and starting fight. Woman loans man thousands after rehab; he claims affair and gifts.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.111
programme.desc: A woman admits to wielding a knife but not to scratching her ex- stepbrother’s car/A woman demands compensation after a young house sitter allegedly damages her home and belongings when she broke the rules and brought her cat along.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.244
programme.desc: A woman sues the father of her two daughters for half of his tax return. Another woman's son is killed in a hit-and-run by a drunk driver, dividing former friends over a loan made from the insurance settlement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.122
programme.desc: Woman and niece sue niece's ex-friend over wrecked Jeep Commander/injured woman sues for nude photos posted online/woman sues estranged daughter-in-law for loan to recover repossessed car.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.126
programme.desc: A loose barter arrangement for rent ends with a woman suing her ex-landlord for allegedly evicting her from his home and failing to return her belongings.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.41
programme.desc: Young man smashes TV after stepfather allegedly points gun; sues for false vandalism, terrorist threats charges/Teen sues former friend for car-taking, damage; he claims permission to buy cigarettes.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.200
programme.desc: Teens deny vandalizing a teacher's car with rocks; a surprise witness emerges. A woman sues her ex-fiancé for money invested in his home and furniture return.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.233
programme.desc: A man faces a lawsuit for unpaid rent and property damage stemming from a Jacuzzi party, marijuana arrests, and roommate issues. Another man accuses his cousin of violence and property damage after refusing her late-night alcohol run request.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining four chefs sample one of Ramsay's complex entrees and then must re-create it correctly and two of the chefs face elimination.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The cooking competition reaches its climax, Gordon presides as the two remaining contestants choose a kitchen team made up of their former rivals. Who will best organise their former teammates and lead themselves to victory this year?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: One contestant's overly speedy delivery arouses Gordon's suspicions. Will they be able to win back his respect during the first dinner service of the series?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the second show of the series, the men hope to redress the balance after last week's disastrous start as they take on a beach side challenge. Later, a ruined risotto could spell the end of the line for one unlucky hopeful.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Despite having three chefs ejected, it looks like the blue team's fortunes could be improving after another fraught dinner service. Will raw fish and overcooked meat spell the end for more than one hopeful from the red team?(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon challenges the teams to cater a school graduation ceremony before they face another star-studded dinner service. With certain hopefuls bent on sabotage, which team will emerge victorious?(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monk in the Trunk
programme.desc: On this premiere of Operation Repo's brand new season, Sonia's rehabilitation from her gunshot wound takes a shocking turn. The whole team runs into trouble on a job when they attempt to repossess a carnival ride from a group of wannabe carnies...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Super-Sonia
programme.desc: Sonia's recovery takes another unexpected turn when she goes too far with a debtor. Sonia and Matt sneak onto a big studio lot to repossess a trailer, but there's a big surprise in store when it turns out Matt and the movie's star have a checkered...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Interview with the Repo Man
programme.desc: Things get a lot more complicated for the team when Sonia snaps and puts herself on the business end of a knife and the gangbanger wielding it. Froy and Sonia wind up in the middle of a relationship dispute with an absent-minded professor who's got...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Disaster at the Derby
programme.desc: The repo team confronts the toughest challenge yet: one-on-one interviews with an anger management specialist. Lyndah and Froy head to the Hollywood Hills to find a luxury sedan.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Trouble with Tractors
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah find themselves surrounded by a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car, Lou and Sonia get lost in translation...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Welcome Back Rotter
programme.desc: Matt and Froy crash the meeting of a fraternal lodge to ask for a car, but instead, they get an angry old man with a rifle. Froy and Matt go on a repo that turns into a battle royale.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Crunch Time
programme.desc: Matt and Froy crash the meeting of a fraternal lodge to ask for a car, but instead they get an angry old man with a rifle. Froy and Matt go on a repo that turns into a battle royale.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: All the Wrong Moves
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party..(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Heart Attack Panic
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia are caught in a desperate situation when the owner of their target car is struck by a heart attack. Plus, a repo becomes violent under the watchful eye of the finance company.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Audrey is upset when Jeff reveals to her that he does not believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost. Meanwhile, Russell tries to persuade Timmy not to go through with his arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Indian Giver
programme.desc: Audrey is surprised by Jeff's sudden interest in her favorite reality show until she discovers the reason. Meanwhile, to Russell's delight, Timmy has second thoughts about his impending arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 3rd Wheel
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Jeff, Audrey lies to her homely friend Liz that she is on Jeff's list of women he would sleep with if Audrey were not around.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Snoozin' For A Bruisin'
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally rolls over and clocks Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Free Free Time
programme.desc: When Audrey's weekly girls' night out is canceled, Jeff seeks out time alone; however, his plans are foiled every step of the way. Meanwhile, Russell discovers that Timmy has a lot of pent-up aggression toward him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Score
programme.desc: Jeff spends the evening trying to avoid learning the score of a Rangers game after Audrey forces him to give up his tickets and go to her boss' party instead. Meanwhile, at the game, Russell is mortified when Timmy roots against the home team.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Atlantic City
programme.desc: Audrey tries to make Jeff feel guilty for not telling her that his friend's bachelor party in Atlantic City was canceled; however, her plan backfires when Jeff discovers that Audrey is also being deceitful.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Surrogate
programme.desc: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby. Meanwhile, Russell shamelessly pokes fun at Jennifer and Adam's wedding Web site.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: They Do?
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, to keep Russell and Timmy from finding out about the ceremony, Adam tells them he is staging an intervention for Jeff.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.sub-title: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.(n)

programme.title: Space Truckers
programme.desc: A space trucker and his cute fiancee are on their way from a space station to Earth with an unknown cargo. When space pirates hijack them, 5000 disintegrator robots are found in the cargo.(n)

programme.title: Daybreakers
programme.desc: The year is 2019, and an unknown plague has transformed the world's population into blood-thirsty vampires. As humans and their blood become more scarce, vampires must search for new ways to satisfy their craving.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Beneath the icy surface, survivors of Colony Seven struggle as food supplies dwindle and temperatures drop. Plagued by illness, the colonists suspect the worst when they mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five, the only other known settlement.(n)

programme.title: A Guide to Recognizing Your Saints
programme.desc: A coming-of-age drama about a young man (Shia LaBeouf) growing up in 1980s New York who believes he has been saved from the culture of violence and drugs by various so-called saints.(n)

programme.title: The Man Without A Face
programme.desc: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then, he finds out the disfigured recluse (Mel Gibson, "Braveheart") living nearby is an ex-teacher.(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: An entry-level employee at a powerful corporation finds himself occupying a corner office, but at a dangerous price: he must spy on his boss's old mentor to secure for him a multi-billion dollar advantage.(n)

programme.title: Castle Falls
programme.desc: Castle Heights Hospital, a symbol of the city's segregated past, is ready to be demolished. No one knows that a gang leader, now in prison, hid the 3 million dollars in cash he stole from his rivals inside the abandoned building.(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Law
programme.desc: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.(n)

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Craig Fairbrass stars as Lex, who has been told that his daughter has died in LA. However, he finds that the body isn't his daughter, and that an internet fraudster has her hostage. Lex wreaks havoc through the streets of LA trying to find her.(n)

programme.title: Christmas In The City
programme.desc: After closing down her family business, Wendy and her daughter move to the city for a job in the toy department. Her excitement is short lived when the store's consultant ruins the holiday spirit by replacing Santa with a male underwear model.(n)

programme.title: K9 Christmas: Scoot & Kassie's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: Kassie rescues Scoot, a former K-9 police dog, who becomes her best friend. But when two men turn up to work at the bank that Kassie's dad (Luke Perry) manages she finds out they are crooks with plans to get their hands on all the money and ruin Christmas.(n)

programme.title: One Bad Christmas
programme.desc: Big Earl is the owner of a Christmas tree lot, he has a big heart and big visions. The week before Christmas, his son Derrick, trying to prove to his dad that he is a success, gets into trouble and puts the survival of his dad’s business in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Siege
programme.desc: The siege was one of the worst and unexpected cases of violence both Napier and New Zealand had witnessed and it was all the more shocking because of its ordinary suburban backdrop.(n)

programme.title: Vows of Deception
programme.desc: When a prominent lawyer is found murdered, his wife is promptly arrested and charged with the crime. She swiftly accuses her stepson, with whom she claims to be having an affair.(n)

programme.title: Hatchet Hour
programme.desc: An ambitious lawyer kills her gardener by mistake, fearing her chances with the law and the impact this will have on her career at a prestigious firm, she turns to her best friend to help her get rid of the body.(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: A faithful wife who is tired of standing by her devious husband is enraged when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Sam relies on old friends to help him survive new dangers.(n)

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: On the day of the NFL draft, the general manager of the Cleveland Browns must decide what he's willing to sacrifice as he angles for the number-one pick.(n)

programme.title: Bite The Bullet
programme.desc: A disparate group of individuals enter a horse race through 700 miles of the Wild West to win a large cash prize. Starring: Gene Hackman, Candice Bergen, James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.(n)

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.(n)

programme.title: Grace and Goliath
programme.desc: Hollywood big-shot Josh Jenkins sweeps into Belfast to make a movie, but before long his world crashes and he loses everything. Hotel cleaner Lily invites him to stay with her family and gradually the people of this 'strange' city touch his heart forever.(n)

programme.title: Windstorm
programme.desc: Rebel teen Mika encounters a beautiful, wild stallion named Windstorm at her grandmother's riding school and learns she can communicate with horses.(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season: The Winning Season
programme.desc: The story of a washed up basketball coach who must learn to overcome his love of booze and his overdeveloped macho nature in order to re-invent himself as a real man and give a bunch of no-hopers a shot at a WINNING SEASON!(n)

programme.title: Ghost World
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Champagne Charlie
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Tommy Trinder as the music hall star Champagne Charlie and his rise to become one of the best known music hall stars of the 19th Century.(n)

programme.title: Checkpoint
programme.desc: The agent of an auto industrialist is sent to Italy to lure an Italian designer away from his firm. However, the plan goes wrong and leads to theft, corruption and even murder.(n)

programme.title: A Cuckoo in the Nest
programme.desc: Leaving to join his wife at a party in the country, Peter misses his train through chatting to an old friend, Marguerite. The two are forced to stop at an inn which only has one room left. But unknown to Peter, he is being pursued by his in-laws!(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Goes West
programme.desc: An American businessman's family convinces him to buy a Scottish castle and disassemble it to ship it to America brick by brick, where it will be put it back together. But it is later found to be haunted.(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Audrey is hired at One Eyed Jacks, but is caught in a trap when her father arrives. Cooper gets Jacques Renault to reveal the details of Laura's last night in the cabin. Deputy Andy saves Truman's life and apprehends Renault.(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.sub-title: May The Giant Be With You
programme.desc: A wounded Agent Cooper has a vision of a giant who gives him several clues about the murder of Laura Palmer. Shelly and Pete recover from the mill fire, but Josie and Catherine are missing.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Trunk
programme.desc: A young man at a motel discovers an empty trunk that grants any wishes. He uses it for popularity, but at a party he discovers who his true friends are.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Appointment on route 17
programme.desc: After finishing a heart transplant, a man finds his personality has changed. He also discovers that he has a strange attraction to a waitress at a road diner.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: The Cold Equations
programme.desc: A rescue pilot on the frontiers of space is faced with unpleasant prospects when he finds an innocent stowaway on his ship.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Stranger in Possum Meadows
programme.desc: A young boy playing in a field meets an old man who is really an alien collecting specimens to bring back to his planet.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Pax Romana
programme.desc: When we left Magnus, Will, Henry and Kate, they had met with a hostile welcome upon gaining access to the city of Praxis in Hollow Earth.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Hangover
programme.desc: Finding the front door left ajar and furniture turned over, Magnus arrives home to discover the building’s defense protocols disabled, no one in sight, and the Sanctuary in alarming disarray.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: One Night
programme.desc: Will and Abby go on a dinner date, but on the way to the restaurant, their flirtatious exchange is abruptly halted when they are forced into a van at gunpoint.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: The team gathers for their scheduled morning meeting with Will uncharacteristically absent. Kate goes to his room to find out where he is and discovers that although he feels normal, he doesn’t look the part.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Wingman
programme.desc: Will is getting ready for his big date with Abby while Henry prepares for a romantic night out with Erika. When the two meet in the hallway, they realize that they have made the same reservation for the same restaurant and the same time.(n)
